image.title: World News Headlines, Latest International News, World Breaking News - Times of India

item.title: Trump labels Harris as 'radical left lunatic' in Pennsylvania rally; says 'Biden hates Kamala'
item.description: Former President Donald Trump criticized Vice President Kamala Harris and President Joe Biden during a rally in Pennsylvania, focusing on their economic policies. Trump claimed that Harris's background and policies have worsened the economy, citing inflation and lower real incomes. He also warned of an economic depression if he does not win the upcoming election.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Son of Creedence Clearwater Revival drummer charged with girlfriend’s murder, linked to second killing
item.description: Brent Clifford, son of Creedence Clearwater Revival drummer Doug Clifford, was charged with the murder of his girlfriend, Patricia Portella-Wright, after her remains were found near a Nevada highway. Clifford, 55, was also named a person of interest in the killing of William Andrews, found dead with a gunshot wound. Clifford is being held without bail.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Israeli strike in south Lebanon kills 10, injures 5
Earthquake of magnitude 7.2 hits Russia's Kamchatka
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Kamala Harris campaign reserves $370 million in ads after labour day, targets battleground states
item.description: Vice President Kamala Harris' campaign had reserved $370 million for advertising from Labor Day to Election Day in crucial battleground states. The campaign planned to spend $170 million on television ads and over $200 million on digital platforms. In contrast, Donald Trump's campaign reserved ads in only Pennsylvania and Georgia.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Once a democrat voting for Hillary, now ... ': What J D Vance said about wife Usha
item.description: Usha Vance, wife of Ohio Senator JD Vance, shifted from supporting Hillary Clinton to embracing the MAGA agenda. Her transformation has drawn interest due to her Democratic roots and elite educational background. Usha's support and contributions have been significant in JD's political journey, highlighting her behind-the-scenes influence.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: 'He definitely was a hero': Wife of Donald Trump rally hero Corey Comperatore speaks out for the first time
item.description: During a rally for Donald Trump in Butler Township, Corey Comperatore died while protecting his family from gunfire. His widow and daughters recounted his courageous act, describing him as a hero. The family received vast support and plans to start a foundation in his name. Legal action is being pursued for security lapses at the event.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Watch: Trump video criticises Kamala Harris as 'weak,' 'failed,' 'dangerously liberal'
item.description: Former President Donald Trump released a video on X (formerly Twitter) targeting Kamala Harris. The video contained clips of Harris discussing policy positions, including eliminating filibusters, banning fracking, supporting gun confiscation, and advocating for socialist health care. The video aimed to portray her as weak, failed, and dangerously liberal, raising concerns over her potential presidency.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Pakistan formulates strategy to tackle mpox, allays fears of outbreak
item.description: The Pakistan government formulated a policy to address the mpox virus after only one case was reported. Surveillance and screening procedures were instated at entry points, with laboratories allocated for diagnosis. Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif ordered strict vigilance and an awareness campaign. Public isolation and prompt doctor consultation were advised for symptomatic individuals.

item.title: Kamala Harris’s 'day one' price control plan draws conservative skepticism: 'You've spent three-and-a-half years raising prices'
item.description: Vice President Kamala Harris faced criticism for her pledge to tackle rising prices on the first day of her potential presidency. Critics highlighted her nearly four-year tenure in the current administration, questioning why these issues have not been addressed earlier.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Bangladesh’s ousted PM Sheikh Hasina faces seventh murder case charges
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Donald Trump set to rally Pennsylvania voters near Biden’s hometown, counter Harris' surge
item.description: Donald Trump rallied voters in northeastern Pennsylvania, seeking support from conservative, white working-class voters. Trump highlighted perceived Democratic vulnerabilities following Biden's exit, paving the way for Kamala Harris's presidential run. Harris plans a bus tour, while Trump aims to capitalize on his past electoral success in Luzerne County.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Former Rep. George Santos expected to plead guilty to multiple fraud charges
item.description: Former US Representative George Santos was expected to plead guilty to multiple fraud counts in his federal case. The plea was set for a Monday hearing on Long Island, following a joint request by both parties involved. Scheduled jury selection on September 9 might be impacted.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: 'Censorship dispute': Elon Musk's X to close operations in Brazil
item.description: Elon Musk's social media platform X ceased operations in Brazil due to censorship orders from Judge Alexandre de Moraes. X claimed Moraes threatened one of its legal representatives with arrest unless they complied. This follows earlier orders to block accounts linked to spreading fake news and hate messages during former President Jair Bolsonaro's term.
item.dc:creator: TOI Tech Desk

item.title: Indonesia celebrates 79th independence day amidst unfinished future capital: Ceremony highlights
item.description: indonesia celebrates 79th independence day amidst unfinished future capital: ceremony highlights

item.title: 'Worked at McDonald’s ... ': Kamala Harris shares early life struggles, posts pic with mom
item.description: Kamala Harris shared her childhood's economic struggles and the challenges faced by her family, who were renters for most of her early life. She recounted her mother saving for over a decade to buy a home. Harris also discussed working at McDonald's during college. She promised to prioritize reducing living costs and increasing economic security if elected president.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: US presidential elections: 'Hope' and 'progress' in America as Donald Trump totters
item.description: Shepard Fairey, known for the Obama 'hope' poster, released a similar Kamala Harris 'progress' poster for the current election. His endorsement of Harris and her running mate Tim Walz contrasts his past disappointment with Obama and refusal to support Clinton or Biden. Fairey found inspiration in Harris's campaign message: 'We are not going back.'
item.dc:creator: Chidanand Rajghatta

item.title: Indonesia celebrates 79th Independence Day in unfinished new capital Nusantara

item.title: Firefighters battle to contain five wildfires across Turkey

item.title: US presidential elections: Donald Trump drafts Tulsi Gabbard for debate preparation
item.description: Donald Trump enlisted former Democratic lawmaker Tulsi Gabbard to help him prepare for a debate against Kamala Harris. The move aimed to structure his campaign and regain support amid erratic behavior and declining poll numbers. Gabbard, aligned with Trump's views on national security, had clashed with Harris in a 2019 debate.
item.dc:creator: Chidanand Rajghatta
